entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:51 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 8:06 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: SSE 30 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
